DOC.brief_summary: Combining interscalene block infraclavicular block humerus surgery provide unique surgical anaesthesia postoperative analgesia .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Interscalene Infraclavicular Block Humerus Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Interscalene block provide effective surgical anaesthesia shoulder proximal arm surgery . However , sometimes inadequate distal arm surgery . Combining infraclavicular block interscalene block may provide successful surgical anaesthesia humerus surgery .
DOC.criteria: Patients accept peripheral nerve block technique humerus surgery Unilateral orthopedic humerus surgery 18 year age old Patients refuse peripheral nerve block Noncooperate patient Neuropathy etiology affect extremity
